subject: Re: A shipment from order #SSN2625 is on the way
description_text:
Hello, This issue remains unresolved, and I have not received a response. When can I expect a concrete update on the transfer to CDEK and a new delivery ETA? Please respond promptly.Кому: "service@simsonn.com" <service@simsonn.com>; Тема: A shipment from order #SSN2625 is on the way; 09:25, 27 сентября 2025 г., "Иван Ткачев" <ivan.tkachev1997@yandex.ru>: Hello, Thank you for your response. However, the tracking link you provided (https://russia.kingtrans.net/WebTrack?action=list) is currently unavailable and does not open. As I mentioned in my previous email, my main questions remain unanswered: 1. What is the estimated date for the parcel to be handed over to CDEK after customs clearance? 2. What is the estimated delivery timeframe to my address? This information is still highly relevant. According to the information on your website at the time of purchase, the delivery was expected to take 5-12 days. However, 16 days have already passed since the order was placed, and the parcel has not yet been transferred to the final courier service. Could you please provide a more precise estimate regarding the two questions above? Thank you for your understanding. Best regards, Ivan Tkachev.   Кому: "ivan.tkachev1997@yandex.ru" <ivan.tkachev1997@yandex.ru>; Тема: A shipment from order #SSN2625 is on the way; 06:31, 23 сентября 2025 г., "service@simsonn.com" <service@simsonn.com>: 
 
 
Hello, the parcel will be handed over to CDEK once customs clearance is complete. You may track it using this link for now. The parcel has currently arrived at the customs clearance port and is queuing for clearance. Your tracking number: 10159941498 https://russia.kingtrans.net/WebTrack?action=list
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 On
 Sun, 21 Sep at 8:26 AM
 , Иван Ткачев <ivan.tkachev1997@yandex.ru> wrote:
 Dear Support Team, 
 
 Thank you for your notification that order #SSN2625 has been shipped and for providing the tracking number: 10159941498. 
 
 However, when checking the status on the CDEK courier service website, it shows that the sender has not yet handed over the parcel to the delivery service. 
 
 Could you please clarify: 
 
 1. The planned date when the order will be handed over to CDEK? 
 2. The estimated delivery timeframe? 
 
 Thank you in advance for your assistance! 
 
 Best regards, 
 Ivan Tkachev   
 
Кому: "ivan.tkachev1997@yandex.ru" <ivan.tkachev1997@yandex.ru>; Тема: A shipment from order #SSN2625 is on the way; 06:12, 17 сентября 2025 г., SIMSONN <service@simsonn.com>:

conversations.body_text: Hi Иван Ткачев,    We apologize for the inconvenience caused. We will follow up with the logistics provider and inquire about the reason for the delay.
Hi Any updates?   Кому: "ivan.tkachev1997@yandex.ru" <ivan.tkachev1997@yandex.ru>; Тема: A shipment from order #SSN2625 is on the way; 06:56, 30 сентября 2025 г., "service@simsonn.com"

Hi Иван Ткачев,    We apologize for the delayed response. We are currently on an 8-day holiday break. We will contact the logistics provider for updates once the holiday concludes. We sincerely apologize for any inconvenience caused.

Hi, There has been no response regarding my parcel. Can someone please tell me where my parcel is right now? The delivery has taken more than a month, but your website says it should be 5-12 days. For a long time, no one has been able to give me an estimated delivery time. How much longer do I need to wait? ---------------- Кому: ivan.tkachev1997@yandex.ru (ivan.tkachev1997@yandex.ru); Тема: A shipment from order #SSN2625 is on the way; 07.10.2025, 11:23, "service@simsonn.com"

Hi Иван Ткачев,  We sincerely apologise for the delay caused. Our logistics provider has indicated that, owing to the ongoing and inconclusive negotiations regarding the customs treaty between Kazakhstan and Russia, all vehicles currently stranded remain unable to proceed.

Hi, Can you please double-check with your logistics provider whether it is planned to be delivered at some point or not? Do I need to wait some more time, or can it not be delivered in the near future? ---------------- Кому: ivan.tkachev1997@yandex.ru (ivan.tkachev1997@yandex.ru); Тема: A shipment from order #SSN2625 is on the way; 15.10.2025, 10:02, "service@simsonn.com"

Hi, Can you please double-check with your logistics provider whether it is planned to be delivered at some point or not? Do I need to wait some more time, or can it not be delivered in the near future? -------- Пересылаемое сообщение -------- 15.10.2025, 10:02, service@simsonn.com (service@simsonn.com): Кому: ivan.tkachev1997@yandex.ru (ivan.tkachev1997@yandex.ru); Тема: A shipment from order #SSN2625 is on the way; Hi Иван Ткачев, We sincerely apologise for the delay caused. Our logistics provider has indicated that, owing to the ongoing and inconclusive negotiations regarding the customs treaty between Kazakhstan and Russia, all vehicles currently stranded remain unable to proceed.
